# Form

```example
<Form>
    <Field inline>
        <label>First name</label>
        <Input type="text" placeholder="First Name"/>
    </Field>
    <Field inline>
        <label>Last name</label>
        <Input type="text" placeholder="Last Name"/>
    </Field>
    <Field inline>
        <label>I Agree</label>
        <Checkbox checked/>
    </Field>
    <Button>Submit</Button>
</Form>
```
